title: d.c. DISTRIBUTION SYSTEMS
fullText:
The d.c. distribution systems shall be eitherâ€”
(a)	a fully insulated two-wire d.c. system; or
(b)	a two-wire d.c. system with negative earth.
In negative earth systems the d.c. negative(s) shall be connected to the vessel main earth plate (see Clause 7.1.2).
NOTE: Hull return systems are not permitted, although engine block return systems are accepted.
